articles.author: Sean Conlon, Pia Singh
articles.title: S&P 500 touches 7,000 for first time then retreats as traders await Fed decision: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: The S&P 500 rose to a milestone level ahead of the Federal Reserve's interest rate decision and earnings reports from major tech companies.
articles.content: The S&P 500 reached a milestone level on Wednesday, hitting 7,000 for the first time, before pulling back ahead of the Federal Reserve's interest rate decision and earnings reports from major tec… [+2426 chars]
